post.title: Version

body.raw:
The latest news, updates, and changes on Business Dashboard ## 1.8.1 ### What‚Äôs been fixed üõ† - Drop the Virtual Account BCA in self-payment. - Fixed the missing sample image issue when creating the Message Template with Media type. - Fixed the missing Broadcast Analytics.
## 1.8.0 ### What‚Äôs new ‚≠ê Ô∏è - Default Tax amount needs to change into 11% instead of 10% in top up credit. - Default Tax amount needs to change into 11% instead of 10% in the payment method. - Default Tax amount needs to change into 11% instead of 10% in order details. - Default Tax amount needs to change into 11% instead of 10% in invoice. - Default Tax amount is the percentage of Total amount - discount in top up credit. - Default Tax amount is the percentage of Total amount - discount in payment method. - Default Tax amount is the percentage of Total amount - discount in order details. - Default Tax amount is the percentage of Total amount - discount in invoice.
## 1.7.0 ### What‚Äôs new ‚≠ê Ô∏è - Whatsapp Dashboard docs: new pricing conversation based pricing. - Whatsapp Dashboard new pricing notifications: Banner, Notification, and Email.
## 1.6.1 ### What‚Äôs new ‚≠ê Ô∏è #### Error explanation on broadcast report When a broadcast fails for several phone numbers then the Client will be able to see the explanation on why the failure occurred in the broadcast report ### What‚Äôs been fixed üõ† #### Duplicate number on broadcast report Upon sending a broadcast, when the CSV contains the same number more than once then the report will reflect the actual amount of broadcast message received by the same phone number.
## 1.6.0 ### What‚Äôs new ‚≠ê Ô∏è #### Releasing new features #### New Template Message Submission - Header with Video Now users can choose ‚ÄúVideo‚Äù as header type and upload the video sample as a part of new template message submission. - Front End Enhancement We changed the UI for new template message submission to accommodate expanded features for this step. #### Buttons - Call To Action Clients will be able to send messages with Call to Action features which allows their customers to call a phone number and visit a website. - Quick Reply Clients will be able to send messages with the Quick Reply button which allows their customers to return a simple text message. - CSV Guard Error notification for incorrect CSV format. - Clients will not be able to submit CSV in which the number of parameters are not incompatible with parameters set when creating a template message. - Clients will not be able to submit CSV when the headers are not incompatible with the ones set when creating a template message. - Clients will not be able to submit CSV when the headers are not incompatible with the ones set when creating a template message. ### What‚Äôs been fixed üõ† - New automatic sign up process with embedded sign up. - New self payment feature which enables credit message top up on business dashboard. - Fixed upload image flow when creating a new template message with image.
## 1.5.7 ### What‚Äôs been fixed üõ† Releasing a quick fix when broadcast to the same number multiple times at the same time reflected as the number of messages sent instead of one number. - Error message details in broadcast report Clients will be able to see the error message details when the broadcast failed. - Duplicate number handling on CSV and status details When a broadcast is sent to the same number multiple times at the same time then it will be counted as such instead of just once.
## 1.5.6 ### What‚Äôs New ‚≠êÔ∏è The guidance about the WhatsApp Business Dashboard is currently at Kata Docs. It is easier and simpler for you to follow a step-by-step guide to join us and explore our features. Learn more about [WhatsApp Business Dashboard.](/business-dashboard/introduction) What will you find out üîç - Start your journey in Whatsapp Business Dashboard in [Get Started with WhatsApp Business Dashboard](/business-dashboard/get-started). - Find out more about [How to Use Trial Experience](/business-dashboard/how-to-use-trial). - Guide to topup WhatsApp Credit and Credit history in [Manage Your Broadcast Credit.](/business-dashboard/manage-wa-credit) - Understand more about message templates in [Manage Your WhatsApp Message Templates](/business-dashboard/whatsapp-message-templates). - Know how to broadcast template messages from the WhatsApp Business Dashboard in [Manage Your Broadcast.](/business-dashboard/manage-broadcast) Learn more about WhatsApp business dashboard insight at [How to Use Analytics](/business-dashboard/use-analytics).
## 1.5.5 ### What‚Äôs New ‚≠êÔ∏è Releasing new features: - WhatsApp Embedded Sign Up Allows self sign up process for WhatsApp Business Account usage on business dashboard which will enable registration to be completed within minutes instead of days. - Self Payment Allows registered users to do payment on business dashboard instead of manual invoicing via account managers. - Upload Image Allow registered users to attach images when creating a new template message. ### What‚Äôs been fixed üõ† - New automatic sign up process with embedded sign up. - New self payment feature which enables credit message top up on business dashboard. - Fixed upload image flow when creating a new template message with image.
## 1.5.4 ### What‚Äôs been fixed üõ† Quick bug fix for ongoing issues. - Fixed ‚Äú500 error‚Äù when uploading a new profile picture for WhatsApp number. Error message was message: "File required for file validation" - Fixed Bad Request error when left the webhook URL field blank in the phone number business dashboard.

post.excerpt:
The latest news, updates, and changes on Business Dashboard

## 1.8
